description:
Today is the monthly neighborhood trash pick-up day. As everyone in the neighborhood gathers to help pick up all the litter in town, Gabriel and his mother arrive on the scene. Gabriel`s mother taunts B.B.B., saying "Gabriel-chan`s superior talent will shine when picking up trash, too!" The contest is on to see who can pick up the most trash: B.B.B. or Gabriel... and Gabriel overwhelms B.B.B. with a huge vehicle that sucks up litter! How will this contest end?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 負けるな!? 町のゴミ拾い
